website_summaries.verdict: A high-productivity monochrome printer designed for busy SOHO environments.
pros: It will also copy, scan, and fax
cons: Only prints in black and white
Small toner cartridge requires frequent changing

customer_reviews.title: Wireless set up is a breeze if.....
customer_reviews.text: Wireless set up is a breeze if you follow Canon's Youtube video which demonstrates clear, step-by-step directions on how to set up the printer for wireless use. Set up video for Windows and MAC can be found on Youtube . If you use MAC filtering on your wireless router, you will need to ADD the printer's MAC address to your router BEFORE you begin the setup. The printer delivers clear, crisp documents. The scanner is a bit LOUD but it works well. Copying a document works well and copies are delivered quickly. I don't have a telephone line so I can't comment on the fax system but I have a similar unit at work and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: The Buddhist Witch

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give zero stars. It breaks down every day and the technical support is worthless. When I had an issue with the printer, the tech support's advice was to "return it". Like i said, worthless. Buy one from a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Heller

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic laser printer.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid little printer. I was able to connect it to the wifi using the touchscreen and was printing in about a minute. It's fast, quiet and print quality is great for a monochrome. It has a ton of useful features like the quiet mode, scan to email, and scan to a network share. The web interface is very simplistic and i can see how some can get lost in it when setting up smtp/pop/smb settings but there's plenty of help online for those looking. Seems to be better built than some competitors. I highly recomment it if you don't need to print in color.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the printer
customer_reviews.text: Fast to print. Easy to set up. Be aware that it is heavy / definitely not a compact printer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Annoying Caveat
customer_reviews.text: The printer itself is fine, but I'm super annoyed about the scanning feature on this printer. In order to use it, you need to buy a separate USB cable. There is an option to scan wirelessly, but you need the separate USB cable in order to set it up. Riddle me this: I can connect to the printer and print wirelessly with no setup at all, but I have to buy this special usb cable for scanning? Complete bullcrap. Very poor customer service. Additionally, the cable is only $5. I'm not fussing about the extra money - I'm irritated I have to waste my time because Canon was too cheap to include the cable.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Reliable BW printer with many capabilities for home office applications
customer_reviews.text: Easy to plugin for direct printing. However, the CD that came with the printer has 2 drivers that you need to install separately--one for wireless and the other wire-based printing. Don't understand why separate drivers are needed. However, once you decide how to connect the printer, the next few steps to go wireless can be done effectively. I used the direct wireless approach using a smartphone and that worked flawlessly. I even added Google Print as well as others. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Ramon Zarco

customer_reviews.title: Installation Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: As an IT manager for a large public company - I am pretty familiar with IT protocols. Took me three hours to connect this printer to my Comcast router! Add another half an hour to connect to my MAC. Manual and online instructions are useless. Be prepared - you might to be forced to figure it out on your own. Still have not been able to get the FAX function to work. Will give it another couple days - if not successful will return. This is the second CANON printer that is disappointing us. So sad to see a once top quality brand having descended into junk status.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Vrins

customer_reviews.title: laser me this.....
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the easiest printers to install. worked on all the computers immediately. wow! does double sided, so saves paper. only down side... hubby did not getthe one that also had color.
customer_reviews.author: kathy18951

customer_reviews.title: A scam. Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: i got this printer in december 2019. however i didnt start using it until January when school reopens. I am a teacher and that's why I bought. The first week it works fine and then it started jamming. right now i can even print from it . it is not allowing me to print on copy. I want a refund. its crappy
customer_reviews.author: CHERLINE DICKENSON

customer_reviews.title: Great Laser Printer! Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laser printer to work from home. I can’t go to the office and print out invoices and checks due to the virus. This laser printer was very easy to set up to my laptop. I can print, scan and copy. I did not set up the fax since I don’t need it right now. I am very happy with my purchase and I am keeping the printer for my next contract job opportunity. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Its Alright, I expected more.
customer_reviews.text: I had the image class 4570dw for 6years and it was really good. I thought that this one would have been a step up but not at all. When it is asleep you have to switch it off and turn it back on. It would not wake to the touch. It is slow to respond as well, not as the 4570dw. The priint/scan software is better that its predecessor. Also, the print delivery tray is crappy.
customer_reviews.author: kouto anyika

customer_reviews.title: Complex huge tech complicated frustrating printer
customer_reviews.text: Took 5 weeks to try to get it set up. Terrible instructions. Called product support and got long wait times with no real help. Never got it to print wirelessly to any other devices. Gave up and got it to half work with a cord to one computer.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Reichard

customer_reviews.title: Just works
customer_reviews.text: Simple device has everything you need at home or small office. I originally had troubles with Wi-Fi connection, but everything works perfect after I: 1. On computer: added canon driver/app to firewall exceptions 2. On Wi-Fi access point: reserved IP address for the printer, so it alwais has the same IP
customer_reviews.author: qwang89

customer_reviews.title: Great print quality and fast.
customer_reviews.text: The printer is has excellent print quality and is very fast even when printing on both sides. The printer keeps changing its IP address so I need to keep deleting the printer and adding the same printer so that my computer recognizes it. I'm sure there is something I could to do to prevent it the constant change but it isn't apparent from the literature that accompanied the printer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Could not get it to work....had to return as non working
customer_reviews.text: I have Prime but it took 10 days to get delivered, not sure if it's the seller fault or Amazons....but that' s a long time when I've paid for Prime. Date for delivery kept changing every day, sometimes more than once a day. After finally getting it, it did not work. I'm a tech and was setting it up for a customer......had to return as defective. The seller was very easy to work with, but still and disappointing hassle. Not sure who is to blame though.......Canon? Amazon?
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: If you get one of these just call Canon Tech Support and they will help you fast!
customer_reviews.text: There is no point in struggling to try to figure things out as I did! My machine didn't come with a disc but their download is better and faster. They have the best-trained call center staff I ever came across. That's why I keep buying their copiers, cameras, etc. from Canon for home and office
customer_reviews.author: TexasChick

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome home printer!
customer_reviews.text: This has every feature anyone could want. I love this printer and have used the heck out of it since I got it. The wireless printing feature off my phone or another computer is the best. My niece lives with me and goes to online college and prints from the other side of the house all the time. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: This is a BLACK ink only printer!
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of not reading the description fully - after unboxing it and setting it up I realized it was a black ink only, so that's on me. However, It works great, prints fast, and syncs up with my Apple products, including cell phones with ease.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay connected to wifi
customer_reviews.text: Every time I try to print - I have to reset all the settings, reconnect to my router and then delete the printer from my computer and re-add it. Is not compatible with air print - even though that's in the item title. Cannot be used by mobile devices, not compatible with apple or android.
customer_reviews.author: Donny Brassco

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: From out of the box, wouldn't stop jamming and printing shadow images. Instructions were poorly written and online equivalent looked like something from 2002. Support tried their best but had to wait a half hour to get them on phone. There was a problem with a tab on the roller. The whole device feels cheaply made. I returned and bought a Brother MFC-L2750DW, which, so far, has been better on all counts: much clearer and better formatted instructions, worked perfectly on first try.
customer_reviews.author: CertainSlant

customer_reviews.title: Network laser printer that installed easily and produces good black copies.
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to find a monochrome laser that prints on the top side of the input paper. This unit is primarily used for printing checks and I much prefer to process them as a stack of checks with numbers ascending from top to bottom of the stack. Performs as expected. Well satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Fraud?
customer_reviews.text: I just tried to register mine. I provided the serial number as described. Canon feedback was that it is not one of their numbers and therefore cannot be registered. Very frustrating that this is not an official Canon product! It makes a good copy when it works. I've had to reset the wireless lan about every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely exactly what they advertised
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier, I’ve been struggling with HP copiers for six months now. Bought three, return three. This canon product is made in the USA and exactly delivers as Advertise. Copies fast and clear. The whole set up was done in less than 30 minutes. The set up for the Wi-Fi was absolutely incredible, easy and just by pushing one button came online instantly! Best product I have bought all year
customer_reviews.author: L. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Great laser printer
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent printer for the price. I installed this onto my Mac desktop without any problems. The print quality is what you would expect from a commercial copier.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy a laser printer after becoming fed up with inkjet printers. Inkjet printers are made to print money for the people who make them. This laser printer is fast and reliable. I especially like how easy it was to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Bigjman210

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is a good printer for a small one woman office/private practice. The manual wasn't much help. I watched a YouTube video to learn how to put in my password etc to connect to my internet service. Otherwise, set up is fairly straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: Black-and-white only
customer_reviews.text: Would've been nice if anywhere in the listing for this printer, Canon bothered to mention that it's NOT A COLOR PRINTER.
customer_reviews.author: MRHIGHSPEED

customer_reviews.title: Love my Canon ImageclassMF267dw
customer_reviews.text: Canon ImageclassMF267dw is an awesome black & white printer, copier (haven't tried scanning or faxing - use it basically for home.) It prints 2 sided, you can print 2 pages on front and back - it goes to sleep fast, conserves energy - & that is a definite plus!
customer_reviews.author: DIANNE M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer has worked well for about 3 months, copies print a little light, stays connected (wifi) and does not seem like it has problems. A little on the big size, height wise.
customer_reviews.author: Dss

customer_reviews.title: Printer eats paper
customer_reviews.text: I would love to leave excellent reviews but I can't. I love Canon but this is my 1st one that has been garbage. It eats paper. I use the jam free paper and that doesn't work. I am a loan Signing Agent and this was the worse thing I could have purchased for my business.
customer_reviews.author: ALECE ALEXANDER

customer_reviews.title: Canon USA Yes Yes Yes
customer_reviews.text: I have a ton of image class products. They are easy to install, software is not going to slow down your computer and Canon tech support is excellent. I go Laser I go Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Corvino

customer_reviews.title: Great in a dusty warehouse for about 100 pages per day
customer_reviews.text: Not the fastest, not the quietest, not the cheapest. However it's the second one of these I've bought for back in the warehouse because they have held up better than Lexmark or Xerox in a dusty environment. Toner cost is in line with everyone else. Very easy configuration
customer_reviews.author: Echoes

customer_reviews.title: Amazon sent me a used printer
customer_reviews.text: Amazon sent me a used printer with the previous person's SSID and password. There settings and preferences were pre-configured to the previous person's computer. Unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Rectems

customer_reviews.title: Hate it
customer_reviews.text: Hard to navigate. Hard to figure out how to operate. Print settings are completely whacky and I have no idea how to fix it. I HATE THIS STUPID PRINTER!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Newman

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Setup was a little daunting (I'm an "elderly" engineer), but once "hardwired" to the computer, it does all its advertised to do. Wireless setup never worked out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Driver won't work for scan
customer_reviews.text: Prints fine. Cannot get scan working. Scan to email doesn't work even combing through posts and getting deep into settings. Tech guys from my job couldn't get it working either. Overly complex interface. I wish I had purchased something else.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Crapped out after four months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a while, but now get a paper jam every time I try to print. Checked everything on trouble shooting list, but nothing helps. Worthless documentation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality printer with easy wireless printing
customer_reviews.text: This printer is exactly what was needed. The printing comes out fast and with quality. The scanning feature is easy to use and the quality is great. The bonus feature for me is that I can easily print documents from my cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Xander B

customer_reviews.title: Nice printer
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to install. No instructions included. I searched for a you tube video to learn how to get the printer installed. Customer service was not available when I was installing.
customer_reviews.author: CallmeRuth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all my needs. I use this printer at home and was very easy to set up to WiFi so that I can print from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, syncs to my W10 and Android computers so much easier to sync than the 2 HP printers I tried.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wireless printer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy, great wireless printing, from iPhone to laptops everyone can print to this machine. Also fax works and scanner works great as well. Hopefully it will last as long as my last cannon I had for over 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: electronics geek

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I use it for work and it makes everything easier!!! Love the quality and price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Printing on a dime
customer_reviews.text: Product was received in good packing materials and had no damage in shipping. Printer works fast, quiet, and clean print make for quick production of work. Item was priced well. Leaving little to find wrong about this vender and product.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Renfro

customer_reviews.title: Lots of printing with ony 1 cartridge
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Ink cartridge lasts a long time which is what i really care about
customer_reviews.author: Brett Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Printer Broke in 1 week
customer_reviews.text: This printer broke in 1 week. Poor product. If possible send us a replacement. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: N. Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Print quality is abysmal
customer_reviews.text: I paid more money for this printer over other cheaper printers like brother or other Cannon models and my print outs are very light, blurry and not clear many times. Not worth the money I spent. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Ready to give up
customer_reviews.text: I have spent about 8 hours trying to get the scanner and the manual feed paper tray to work. Nothing. I had a tech support guy look at it for while and he could not get them to work. When the machine arrived, it did not contain a USB cord, manual or software CDs. All I have is a second less efficient copier and printer. I hate this thing and will probably dump it in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Boone Reed

customer_reviews.title: It's a great deal on a great printer
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy set-up. Reasonably priced. Great bargain. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Perry

customer_reviews.title: So far very good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, and works well for the little bit of scanning and printing I've done so far. Seamless WiFi print/scan integration to Mac (no need to install a driver). We'll see how it holds up over time, but very satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: D Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good reasonable printer
customer_reviews.text: Faster printing out, reliable CANON brand, print quality is not the best but satisfied. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: moxaking

customer_reviews.title: Best printer I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Best printer I’ve ever owned! No more inkjet problems and all the benefits of a all-in-one printer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great black and white printer comes with  a toner cartridge install.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quick black and white printer quick print time no waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: Amazon's pricing not so great
customer_reviews.text: Printer is fine. Just found it a few days later at Staples for $15 less. I trusted Amazon to have the lowest price. Oh well lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great Multi-Function Printer
customer_reviews.text: Printer works great and was a great value. Setup was a bit tedious with the archaic text message format for entering wireless info, but still happy with it. Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: J M Nick

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. After setting up "wireless" initially appeared to not work. After about 8 hours the awaiting print request started printing without prompting. After the initial issue, I haven't had issues with the wireless network.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Fast printer
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer, only problem I had was that it ONLY PRINTS BLACK AND WHITE, but its fast and easy to setup up. Definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Hester

customer_reviews.title: Great product for windows!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was as easy as windows to install on the pinter on a Mac!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and hadling
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and eSy to handling the printer
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Overall, I’m very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, this printer work. Printing with the airport function is very convenient; however, no USB port for scanning.
customer_reviews.author: VA

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I love my printer for my home business. it came early and it is $40 cheaper than the printer at Staples.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Nice printer
customer_reviews.text: Nice printer. My only complaint is that occasionally I have to unplug it from the computer in order to get it to run. Other wise no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amberly

customer_reviews.title: New business
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my son for his new business.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Connection Unstable
customer_reviews.text: The Canon MF257dw tends to disconnect from wireless connection. Operations resume after a power off/on cycle.
customer_reviews.author: 20v20

customer_reviews.title: No phone/email support
customer_reviews.text: very poorly written manuals. youtube videos were helpful but didn't solve the problem and they have NO tech support. hot garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be patient with the setup and everything else is going to be great
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent ! But had to contact tech support 3 times to set it up, not the easiest for the scan feature. Tech support was excellent once you get thru.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Buyer
customer_reviews.text: Easy hook up. Does exactly what I need it to do. Being used at a small business.
customer_reviews.author: Derick Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Never works
customer_reviews.text: Printer is always having an issue connecting and or paper jamming.
customer_reviews.author: Ben L.

customer_reviews.title: Still learning.
customer_reviews.text: Hope there is a video to help the learning process.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Bianchi

product_meta.title: Canon Image CLASS MF267dw All-in-One Laser Printer, AirPrint, and Wireless Connectivity, Black, 1
product_meta.description: Style:MF267dwDesigned for small and medium-size businesses, the image class MF267dw balances Speedy performance and minimal maintenance, and the large LCD touch panel delivers and intuitive user experience.
feature_bullets: Print at speeds of up to 30 pages per minute, with your first Print in your hands in approximately 5 seconds
Supports mobile solutions, including apple Air Print, Canon Print business, Mopria Print service, and Google cloud Print. Connect mobile devices without a router using Wi Fi Direct connection
6 Line, black and white touch LCD for easy navigation
Paper capacity allows for 250 sheets in the standard cassette and 1 sheet in the multipurpose tray
All in one functionality allows you to Print, scan, copy and fax with ease

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars281 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
